title: Can't connect to my account!
body:
Hey guys, I haven't connected to my league acc for the past two weeks.. Yesterday when I tried to login I received a message saying that my acc name or password does not match.. I have never had this problem before and I didn't change my password or acc name.. And more than that, when I try to find my acc on op.gg, it says that my acc doesn't exist.. I play on BR server and i posting this here because I can't access my acc to post in the BR forum.. Has this ever happened to one of you guys? 
Thank in advance and sorry about my english, not my first language.

replies.body: If your patcher is set to the proper region but still failing to login, then our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide could help towards recovery.  If you run into any issues, reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  Our account recovery team will be happy to help with recovery as well as updating your account info.  I hope that helps!
